sentences.en: ...a political lobbyist concentrating on urban renewal and regeneration.
sentences.cn: …一个专门就城市复兴与重建而游说的政客。

sentences.en: a renewal of interest in traditional teaching methods
sentences.cn: 对传统教学法重新产生兴趣

sentences.en: Autumn is also the authentic season of renewal.
sentences.cn: 秋天才是真正的除旧布新的季节.

sentences.en: Easter eggs symbolize the renewal of life.
Her contract is coming up for renewal in the autumn.
sentences.cn: 她的合同秋天就应该续签了.

sentences.en: His contract came up for renewal.
I sent in a request for renewal of my subscription.
Is he really considering a renewal of hostilities at this stage?
sentences.cn: 他真的在考虑在这个阶段恢复敌对状态吗？

sentences.en: Mark’s contract comes up for renewal at the end of this year.
sentences.cn: 马克的合同将在今年年末到期，需要续签。

sentences.en: Now it is spring, a time of renewal.
sentences.cn: 现在是春天，万物重生的季节。

sentences.en: Other people seek the mountains for renewal of their inner lives.
sentences.cn: 另一些人到深山中去,寻求新的精神生活.

sentences.en: The post was for one year in the first instance with possible renewal to a further year.
sentences.cn: 该岗位初始为一年期，有可能会再续聘一年。

sentences.en: The premium should be received in this office within fourteen days of the renewal date.
sentences.cn: 保险费用需在14天的续约期内交到此办公室。

sentences.en: There has been very little renewal of personnel in higher education.
sentences.cn: 从事高等教育的人员新老更替极其缓慢。

sentences.en: These three clubs could come under close scrutiny when their licenses come up for renewal.
sentences.cn: 要更新执照的时候，这3家夜总会可能会受到严格审查。

sentences.en: They will discuss the possible renewal of diplomatic relations.
sentences.cn: 他们将讨论恢复外交关系的可能性。

sentences.en: You have to apply for a renewal within six months before expiry.
sentences.cn: 你得在期满每六个月内申请继续注册.

words.tran_cn: 可再生的；可更新的；可继续的
更新，恢复；复兴；补充；革新；[图情]续借；重申

trans.tran_cn: 重建，重生，更新，革新，重申，合同的续订
trans.tran_en: Renewal of something lost, dead, or destroyed is the process of it growing again or being replaced
